Hi,
My name is Abhay Saini,
I am a Pre-final year student at Indian Institute of Information Technology, Una.

An enthusiastic fresher with highly motivated ,quick learner and leadership skills pursuing B.Tech in Information Technology.

Eager to learn new technologies and methodologies always willing to innovate the new things which can improve the existing technology.
Looking for an opportunity to work as an intern to get a hands-on experience of industry standards.

I have good hand experience on Data Structures and algorithms and have a good problem solving skills.I want to be a part of the organization where I could use and enhance my knowledge and talent for the development of both the organization and myself and also get a chance to prove myself with hard work and dedication.So that I would be able to deliver my best to the organization.
